resources.string: This app was made for you by Drew Hannay, Alisa Maas, and Andrew Wolfe, with graphics designed by Jacob Meindertsma. If you have any trouble with the app, or suggestions for improving it, fill out our Contact Form by pressing the menu button on the home screen of the app. If all is going wonderfully for you (as it should, with all the work we put into this), then maybe you should thank us. Our CPO numbers are 1122, 2122, 3175, and 2263, respectively. So if you suddenly find yourself in the mood for writing personal notes, keep us in mind. (We also accept candy...yum...)
